attributes.action: Increase the level at which inheritance tax starts to £600.000 for divorcees as well as married couples.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst the increase in the level of the inheritance tax band to £600,000 for married couples, widows and widowers is welcomed, what about devorced people with children?  Why should they be discriminated against?  Why should their children/grandchildren have to pay tax over the £300k threashold whilst others do not. It should be the same for all.
